text: Nuthalapati Venkata Ramana born 27 August 1957) is an Indian judge who served as the 48th Chief Justice of India from 24 April 2021 to 26 August 2022. Previously, he was a Judge of Supreme Court of India, Chief Justice of Delhi High Court and the acting Chief Justice of Andhra Pradesh High Court. He has also served as the president of the Andhra Pradesh Judicial Academy. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Chief justices of India
title: N. V. Ramana
